title: The iust dovvn[fall of] ambition, adultery, and murder where-vnto are added 3. notorious sinners. Weston. M. Turner and Fran[klin] With his arraignement, confession and e[xecution] VVho all suffered death for the [mur]der if Sir Tho: Ouerbury, poysone[d in] the Tower: of whom to these discourses [is] ioyned an elegy, vpon the death of Sir Thomas Ouerbury.
author: I. T., fl. 1616.
notes: An edition of: The bloody downfall of adultery.
Printer's name from and publication date conjectured by STC.
Running title reads: The iust downfall of three notorious sinners.
Appended, with caption title: "A funerall elegie, vppon the vntimely death of the honourable knight Sir Thomas Ouerburie", signed I.T.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
